subject: docs: add dashboard architecture (tab mapping, view levels) to CLAUDE.md
body:
Elevate stable architectural details from SESSION_NOTES to CLAUDE.md so
AI assistants understand the dashboard structure without needing to read
a second file.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01HTc7iDoipU2BGUF3Kz78hu
